amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds appropriated or made available in this Act may be used for United States military exercises which include any participation by the People's Republic of China.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 60 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit participation by the Peoples Republic of China in joint U.S. military exercises.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stockman amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 286 (Roll no. 404).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stockman amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 286 (Roll no. 404).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Stockman.
